about_the_game:
Yeehaw, y’all! Time to spruce up the Wardrobe with three new cosmetics.

The Limited Time Pack: Round Up bundle includes:

⭐ Ten Gallons (Hat) ⭐

All hat and no cattle. Filled to the brim with brains, bravery, and beans.

This beaut is a recreation of the Ten Gallons hat from the original Among Us.

💈 Mustachioed (Hat) 💈

Fresh off the barber seat, it’s bushy, bristled, and curled to perfection.

The Ten Gallons hat from the original Among Us adds a stylish mustache for those with twisty intentions.

🐴 Howdy Duty (Skin) 🐴

The ABCs of Deputy Fashion: ascot, badge, chaps, and danger!

No horsing around, this Among Us VR original skin was designed specifically for those wild cow-beans.

Wrangle up these looks for the ultimate style showdown! The sun sets on the Limited Time Event: Round Up on January 28, 2025 — and these cosmetics go alongside it. 🏜️

Disclaimer: Wearing these cosmetics does not guarantee a higher chance of being selected as Deputy during the Limited Time Event: Round Up.

movies.name: Among Us VR - Limited Time Pack: Round Up

name: Among Us VR - Limited Time Pack: Round Up
short_description: Yeehaw, y’all! 🏜️ Become best dressed in the Wild West with three new cosmetics to get you lookin’ darn tootin’ dandy! Ten Gallons (Hat) ⭐ — All hat and no cattle. Mustachioed (Hat) 💈 — Sometimes there’s a bean. I won’t say a hero. Howdy Duty (Skin) 🐴 — Time to get deputized!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
